Documentation.long_help:
This filter removes tetrahedra from a data set that have an edge larger than a maximum length.
In addition, vertices are added for points in the data set not connected to any tetrahedra.
Documentation.short_help: Filter out tetrahedra from a data set that have an edge larger than a specified size.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaximumEdgeLength
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The maximum size of a tetrahedra edge in the output dataset.
